{"id":1192147983,"question_id":3338,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 week, 2 days","timestamp":1709433691,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1192147983/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Count Submatrices with Top-Left Element and Sum Less Than k","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int countSubmatrices(vector<vector<int>>& grid, int k) {\n        int n = grid.size(), m = grid[0].size();\n        int ans = 0;\n        for(int i = 1; i < n; i++){\n            grid[i][0] += grid[i-1][0];\n            if(grid[i][0] <= k) ans++;\n        }\n        for(int i = 1; i < m; i++){\n            grid[0][i] += grid[0][i-1];\n            if(grid[0][i] <= k) ans++;\n        }\n        for(int i = 1; i < n; i++){\n            for(int j = 1; j < m; j++){\n                grid[i][j] = grid[i][j-1] + grid[i-1][j] - grid[i-1][j-1];\n                if(grid[i][j] <= k) ans++;\n            }\n        }\n        return ans + (grid[0][0] <= k);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"count-submatrices-with-top-left-element-and-sum-less-than-k","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
